label: Third-Person Full-Body Game POV
def_question: Is this a 3D gaming video featuring a third-person perspective with the character’s full body visible?
alt_question: Is this a full-body third-person view, commonly seen in gaming?
Does the shot frame the character’s entire body within the scene?
Is the camera positioned far enough to show the entire character in the environment?
def_prompt: A third-person 3D game video with the entire character visible.
alt_prompt: A scene showing a character’s full-body from a third-person perspective.
A video where the character is fully framed within their surroundings.
A gaming-style shot where the entire character is visible.
